nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_146
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: For all their great efforts, the museum's daily attendance has so far still been very low.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_147
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: In response to criticism by government inspectors, the company changed some of its practices rather than gave up its rules.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_148
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The police warned the passengers against putting money and precious things in bags lest they should be stolen.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_149
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Surveys ought to focus on how parents and children perceive the ways in which the school satisfies their needs.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_150
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: In a flash, Tess changed from an innocent girl to a mature and well-educated woman.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_151
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I can confirm that 200 new trains are being manufactured and that the first of those trains will come into service in May this year.
